item.title: Identifying My Target
item.description: Identifing Our Target linkNeed to identify What’s within the SCOPE and What’s not. Example: https://bugcrowd.com/tesla

item.title: Discovering Email Addresses
item.description: Discovering Email Addresses linkHunter.io linkhunter.io also can identify the pattern of the email address. In this case it is {f}{last}@tesla.com which means {fist name initial}{last name}@tesla.com If I had an account created, I can see alot more information about the email addresses of the target. Phonebook.cz link Clearbit linkThis is also a fantastic Chrome Extension that allows me to discover email addresses with some other cool details that other tools did not find.

item.title: Hunting Credentials
item.description: Dehashed linkThis is a website wich costs money but definitely worth it. With this I can browse through all the breached databases and find potential credentials in many ways.
